translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter with the Teaching on the Word
The Elder Kiṁsuka-flower Worshipper’s Birth Story
Seeing a kiṁsuka flower in bloom,🔽I put my hands together in respectful salutation,
I do not recall any bad destination,
this is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.
I have done what the Buddha taught.”

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā kiṁsukapūjako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā kisukapūjakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: Thus the elder Kiṁsuka-flower Worshipper recited these verses.
The Elder Kiṁsuka-flower Worshipper’s Birth Story, the third.
